statement.text: A target FICO<sup>®</sup> Score 8 of 704 could be met within 6 months with the following actions:

actions.text: Pay down $637 of your total revolving/open account balances of $6,373 every month for 6 months.
Pay all your bills on time for 6 months.
Stay current on your payments so that your most recent delinquency ages to 10 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that the time since your most recently opened account ages to 1 year, 6 months.
Do not open any new accounts, so that your average length of established history ages to 5 years, 2 months.
Continue to make your monthly installment loan payments on time to reduce the total installment loan balances of $69,428 you owe.
Do not apply for any new credit.
